item.title: Post puslapis
item.description: Nuotraukos idejimo kodas: ![](/nuotraukele.jpg) Bet koks kodas: console.log(i); } const numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; const sum = numbers.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0); console.log(sum); function getArea(width, height) { return width * height; } const user = { name: "John Doe", age: 30, }; console.log(`Hello, my name is ${user.name}`);```

item.title: Tomkidzes servas
item.description: Pora sakiniu as dainuoju ir sustoti negaliu. Negalvoju apie tave as savim tiktais tikiu.
